sub_title: Scrum Master at ABN AMRO Bank N.V.
summary:
Bob van Leeuwen executes the role of project manager / business analist with a focus on channel management related topics linked to channels like contact center, IVR, web/internet and mobile and/or linked to offering and execution of payments. Due to a marketing background and a developed interest in IT, Mr. Van Leeuwen is familiar with business processes as well as IT processes within customer contact centers. With this background he has dealt with generating business requirements, functional designs, validation of technical designs, definition and execution of end-user tests and the delivery of complex projects with all related aspects (stakeholder management, change request management etc.). 
His ambitions are in the field of change management within organisations which transform to a more customer focused organisation (customer centric). The last 5 years Mr van Leeuwen has developed and materialized knowledge in the payments domain with a focus on SEPA payments. Mr van Leeuwen can be characterized by his loyalty, eagerness to learn and professionalism.

profile_positions.description:
Best Practice:

• Project management for a Commercial and Merchant Banking project related to SEPA migrations for a European Bank
profile_positions.title: Managing Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Best Practices:

• Business Analysis and Project management for the roll out of a cross channel global application for Phone banking services via IVR and Contact Center for a European Bank with implementations in Belgium and Ireland (including requirements management and proof of concept RFP for speech technologies)
• Project management / Business analysis for a Web implementation for a European Bank (revamping of website)
• Project management / Business analysis for the initiation phase for the roll out of a Cisco solution for the contact center of a European Bank
• Project management for Channel implementations for the International Network of a European Bank (Commercial Banking)
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant Financial Services - Channels BtoC

profile_positions.description:
Best Practices:

• Project manager for the build and implementation of a Contact Center registration tool for a pan-European customer service organization for a large medical firm
• Project manager for the European roll out of a remote access tool for a large medical firm
• Business Analysis for requirements management and design of a customer service shared service center for the Dutch government
• Project management for the roll out of a channel management approach for a Dutch insurer
• Business Analysis for the requirements management and design of a Real time marketing application for one of the major telecom operators in the Netherlands
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant CRM Solutions

profile_positions.description:
Mr. Van Leeuwen has fulfilled the role of ICT Manager within the organization Tesselaar Marketing Service B.V.
Within this role Mr. Van Leeuwen was responsible for the quality, availability and reliability of the technical infrastructure of the call centers in both the Netherlands and Luxemburg. He managed to close the gap between business and IT both on processes as on resources. The IT team he coached and managed, consisted of system developers, application developers and telephony specialists (7 FTE). Further Mr. Van Leeuwen advised the organization on developments in technology which could offer business- or process-opportunities. The year 2000 migration as well as the development and implementation of a workforce management system as well as the implementation of Siebel as the main production application illustrate the projects which Mr. Van Leeuwen was responsible for. Mr. Van Leeuwen was member of the Management Team.
profile_positions.title: ICT Manager

profile_positions.description: During a year Mr. Van Leeuwen fulfilled the role of account manager for international customers of Tesselaar Marketing Service B.V. Together with two colleagues he was responsible for the start up of an international contact center in the city of Luxemburg. Responsibility for both the internal organization (operations) as well as the technical infrastructure. From the first day of opening a major project for the introduction of a new car brand within Europe was executed, resulting in phone calls from six different European countries being handled within the Luxemburg contact center. The experience of starting up an international organization with all its aspects, contributed to the ambition of Mr. Van Leeuwen with a main focus on closing bridges between business and IT.
profile_positions.title: International Project Manager

profile_positions.description: Mr. van Leeuwen has fulfilled the role of project manager at Tesselaar Marketing Services B.V. Within this role he was responsible for the execution of direct marketing campaigns for the top 10 customers of the company. The project concerned supporting direct marketing campaigns of customers by processing both incoming as well as outgoing call traffic. Mr. van Leeuwen has developed specific business models to easily and transparent connect with specific customers’ customer processes. Working for the business unit Financial Services, Mr. Van Leeuwen developed and introduced a telemarketing model for a large insurance company based on the scoring of potential customers.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager
